meanings.definition: To make (something) appealing to the general public.
meanings.sent1: The new movie popularizes the idea of friendship and teamwork.
meanings.sent2: She popularizes healthy eating habits by sharing easy recipes online.
meanings.sent3: The comedian popularizes the concept of laughter as the best medicine.
meanings.sent4: His catchy jingle popularizes the idea of happiness in a simple tune.
meanings.sent5: The children's book popularizes the importance of kindness through colorful illustrations.

meanings.definition: To bring (something) into widespread use or acceptance.
meanings.sent1: The social media platform popularizes the use of hashtags for trending topics.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer popularizes the trend of oversized sweaters this season.
meanings.sent3: The quirky inventor popularizes the idea of a robot that makes breakfast in bed.
meanings.sent4: Her innovative approach popularizes the concept of eco-friendly packaging.
meanings.sent5: The catchy slogan popularizes the brand's message of inclusivity and diversity.
